doc.title: Saiko Exciting
doc.plot: A weekly two-hour Saturday & Sunday morning experiment from The Sci-Fi Channel (UK) on all things Japanese. Presented by Seera (aka Sarah Backhouse), aided by Jonathan Clements and with games reviews from Emily Newton-Dunn. Mixed into all this were full episodes of Neon Genesis Evengelion and Martian Successor Nadesico, plus a cornucopia of J-Pop.
